attributes.action: allow all drivers to have the same rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the requirements of Council Directive 91/439/EEC implemented in the UK on 1 January 1997, was the removal of vehicle entitlements such as category B and BE, this was with the view to improving road safety.  However this ruling is discrimination, as most pre 1997 licence holders do not know to drive safelty and correctly, and do not know the highway code in the same detail as post 1997 licence holders

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
